text: Karmenu Mifsud Bonnici (17 July 1933 â€“ 5 November 2022) was a Maltese politician. He served as Prime Minister of Malta from December 1984 to May 1987. He is a member of the Labour Party. In August 2022, Bonnici was hospitalized for a heart arrhythmia. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Malta
title: Karmenu Mifsud Bonnici
